description: When using the scipy library, a ValueError is raised when attempting to perform a mathematical operation on a matrix with incompatible dimensions. This ValueError is raised when attempting to perform any mathematical operation on a matrix with dimensions that are not equal.
code:
#Importing scipy library
import scipy

#Defining a function to calculate the area of a circle
def area_circle(radius):
    area = scipy.pi * (radius ** 2)
    return area
